LaunchVPS Launches Our Cyber Monday! (VPS from $12.40/year, 3GB/3c/50GB/2TB for $33.40/year!)

black friday, kvm, launchvps, philadelphia November 30, 2020 @ 4:00 am, by raindog308

LaunchVPS is here to launch our CyberMonday offers!

They debuted on LEB back in July and now they’ve returned with some special offers for our readers:

  • VPSes starting at $12.40/year! (IPv6-only)
  • Big VPSes, too – a 3GB/3c/50GB/2TB for $33.40/year!

These are based in Philadelphia, PA and are backed with a money-back guarantee and an SLA.  More details available by reading their FAQ.

Here’s a bit more about them in their own words:

“LaunchVPS offers performance optimized SSD virtual servers and web hosting solutions. Founded in 2014 and based in the Philadelphia suburbs, we strive to build and support high quality, cost-effective hosting solutions for our customers. We have over a decade of experience in the hosting industry in the field of virtualization, cloud, and application hosting.

In addition to high-quality infrastructure, we have a distinct passion for assisting and enabling our customers. Our main objective is to offer a solid foundation, very flexible options, and incredibly helpful support. We feel this combines to offer our customers a superior experience which benefits their relationship to their end-users and clients.

We own our server and network hardware running in a secure Philadelphia datacenter consisting of Supermicro servers packed with fast ECC RAM, SSDs in ZFS RAID for ~1Gbps I/O, hexa-core Intel CPUs, and A+B power all linked to our multi-homed BGP redundant network. Additionally, our single inclusive control panel is fully functional including an HTML5 console, power options, boot options, snapshots, backups, ISO library, and usage graphs.

We want to make it easy for the LEB community to get started with our robust hardware platform, reliable network, and easy to use management features by offering special prices on the following exclusive KVM plans! There is nothing to lose with our 45-day no questions asked refund!”

Their WHOIS is public and they’re a registered company in Pennsylvania (entity number 6839714). You can find their TOS on their website and you can pay with Paypal, Major Credit Cards, Alipay, and Crypto-Currencies including Bitcoin.

If you try out LaunchVPS, be sure to comment below so we can hear how it goes!

Now read more to see the offers!
